name: Versus Vampire
description:
Raise an army of ghouls as the Lord vampire or incarnate one of Heroneus's knights in Versus Vampire.

Features:
  • Choose between vampires and humans in this new multiplayer battle arena.


  • As the Lord vampire, use magic powers to raise and command your army.


  • As Heroneus's Knights, grab your swords and holly spells to stop the Lord before he takes over the village.


  • Team up with friends online and have fun slaying with style.





Versus Vampire is the first multiplayer game based on the game-creation sandbox Playcraft:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/805270?utm_source=VersusVampireStorePage
